name: 2D Snow Boarder
data: This is a beutiful 2d game baed on surfing. I made this when I was learing Unity and C#. this is a work of art. I isist you to download the source code and play once you will be mesmeraised with the beuty of this game

name: Spotify Clone
data: Are you ready to immerse yourself in a world of endless musical enchantment? Step into TuneWave, the ultimate Spotify clone designed to harmonize your soul with the rhythm of the universe. With a mesmerizing array of features and a vast library of tracks, TuneWave is poised to become your gateway to boundless auditory delight.

name: E-Leatning App
data: Step into the world of LearnEase, an innovative e-learning app that redefines the way you learn and grow. With a passion for education and a commitment to excellence, LearnEase is designed to make knowledge accessible, engaging, and enjoyable for learners of all ages and backgrounds.

name: ERS(Employee Review System)
data: Introducing: ERS - Elevate Your Workforce, Inspire Excellence! PerforMates is a cutting-edge employee review system that revolutionizes the way organizations evaluate and nurture their workforce. Built with a commitment to transparency, objectivity, and growth, PerforMates empowers companies to unleash the full potential of their employees and foster a culture of continuous improvement.
